meanings.definition: The ability to do something well; expertise.
meanings.sent1: Her skillfulness in painting impressed everyone at the art show.
meanings.sent2: His skillfulness in playing the piano was evident from a young age.
meanings.sent3: The magician's skillfulness in pulling off tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The chef's skillfulness in creating delicious dishes was like a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's skillfulness on the field made it seem like he was born to play the sport.

meanings.definition: The quality of being skilled or proficient.
meanings.sent1: The skillfulness of the carpenter was evident in the intricate details of the furniture.
meanings.sent2: She admired the skillfulness of the seamstress as she watched her work.
meanings.sent3: The robot's skillfulness in completing tasks efficiently amazed the scientists.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's skillfulness on stage was like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: His skillfulness in problem-solving made him the go-to person in the office.
